title: Aromaland Energizing Herb Essential Oil Blend
description: Our Energizing Herb Essential Oil Blend has a strong herbaceous aroma that transforms fatigue into fresh energy. Shop bulk essential oil blends at BulkSkinCare.
cleaned_text: smell of rosemary, cypress and juniper berry combine with basil, lemongrass, orange and vetiver as a natural remedy for exhaustion - mind and/or body. Since aromatherapy has a strong tradition in Europe, this blend is likely to evoke fond memories in those that grew up between the Alps and the Arctic Sea. Its strong herbaceous aroma transforms fatigue into fresh energy. Essential Oils of Rosemary, Cypress, Juniper Berry, Basil, Lemongrass, Orange, and Vetiver. - Wonderful in a diffuser. - Great in a bath - first dilute 6 drops of the essential oil in one ounce of carrier oil such as coconut or jojoba. - Create your own aromatherapy products. You can use Aromaland's carrier oils or unscented (AromaFree®) range of natural body care products to customize all your aromatherapy and personal care needs. - Recommended dilution for most essential oils and blends is 1% (6 drops per 1oz. of base product) for general applications, or 0.5% (3 drops per 1oz. of base product) for facial and sensitive area applications.
